citation: Proclamation under the Public Health (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2015 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Public Health (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2015

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Public Health (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2015 fix 1 July 2015 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

22 June 2015

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Health

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 1 July 2015

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Health and Human Services.
